card.name: Light-Paws, Emperor's Voice (HOLO)
card.text: Whenever an Aura enters the battlefield under your control, if you cast it, you may search your library for an Aura card with mana value less than or equal to that Aura and with a different name than each Aura you control, put that card onto the battlefield attached to Light-Paws, Emperor's Voice, then shuffle.

card.name: Kenrith, the Returned King (HOLO)
card.text: {R}: All creatures gain trample and haste until end of turn. {1}{G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. {2}{W}: Target player gains 5 life. {3}{U}: Target player draws a card. {4}{B}: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Rubinia Soulsinger (HOLO)
card.text: You may choose not to untap Rubinia Soulsinger during your untap step. {T}: Gain control of target creature for as long as you control Rubinia and Rubinia remains tapped.

card.name: Teferi, Time Raveler (HOLO)
card.text: Each opponent can cast spells only any time they could cast a sorcery. [+1]: Until your next turn, you may cast sorcery spells as though they had flash. [−3]: Return up to one target artifact, creature, or enchantment to its owner's hand. Draw a card.

card.name: Jodah, the Unifier (HOLO)
card.text: Legendary creatures you control get +X/+X, where X is the number of legendary creatures you control. Whenever you cast a legendary spell from your hand, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a legendary nonland card with lesser mana value. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Isshin, Two Heavens as One (HOLO)
card.text: If a creature attacking causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.

card.name: Sublime Archangel (HOLO)
card.text: Flying Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Other creatures you control have exalted. (If a creature has multiple instances of exalted, each triggers separately.)

card.name: Soulherder (OTHR)
card.text: Whenever a creature is exiled from the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on Soulherder. At the beginning of your end step, you may exile another target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Preston, the Vanisher (HOLO)
card.text: Whenever another nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, if it wasn't cast, create a token that's a copy of that creature, except it's a 0/1 white Illusion. {1}{W}, Sacrifice five Illusions: Exile target nonland permanent.

card.name: Yorion, Sky Nomad (OTHR)
card.text: Companion — Your starting deck contains at least twenty cards more than the minimum deck size. (If this card is your chosen companion, you may put it into your hand from outside the game for {3} as a sorcery.) Flying When Yorion enters the battlefield, exile any number of other nonland permanents you own and control. Return those cards to the battlefield at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Thassa, Deep-Dwelling (HOLO)
card.text: Indestructible As long as your devotion to blue is less than five, Thassa isn't a creature. At the beginning of your end step, exile up to one other target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under your control. {3}{U}: Tap another target creature.

card.name: Mulldrifter (HOLO)
card.text: Flying When Mulldrifter enters the battlefield, draw two cards. Evoke {2}{U} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

card.name: Mulldrifter (POKE)
card.text: Flying When Mulldrifter enters the battlefield, draw two cards. Evoke {2}{U} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

card.name: Reveillark (POKE)
card.text: Flying When Reveillark leaves the battlefield, return up to two target creature cards with power 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. Evoke {5}{W} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

card.name: Charming Prince (HOLO)
card.text: When Charming Prince enters the battlefield, choose one — • Scry 2. • You gain 3 life. • Exile another target creature you own. Return it to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Eerie Interlude (OTHR)
card.text: Exile any number of target creatures you control. Return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Blue Sun's Zenith (OTHR)
card.text: Target player draws X cards. Shuffle Blue Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.

card.name: Solemn Simulacrum (OTHR)
card.text: When Solemn Simulacrum enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. When Solemn Simulacrum dies, you may draw a card.

card.name: Peregrine Drake (OTHR)
card.text: Flying When Peregrine Drake enters the battlefield, untap up to five lands.

card.name: Delver of Secrets (OTHR)
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top card of your library. You may reveal that card. If an instant or sorcery card is revealed this way, transform Delver of Secrets.

card.name: Insectile Aberration (OTHR)
card.text: Flying

card.name: Panharmonicon (OTHR)
card.text: If an artifact or creature entering the battlefield causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.

card.name: Panharmonicon (Miku)
card.text: If an artifact or creature entering the battlefield causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.

card.name: Miku, Idol Eternal
card.text: Flying Whenever Brago, King Eternal deals combat damage to a player, exile any number of target nonland permanents you control, then return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control.

card.name: Spine of Ish Sah (OTHR)
card.text: When Spine of Ish Sah enters the battlefield, destroy target permanent. When Spine of Ish Sah is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Spine of Ish Sah to its owner's hand.

card.name: Whispersilk Cloak (FGO)
card.text: Equipped creature can't be blocked and has shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Equip {2}

card.name: Well of Lost Dreams (OTHR)
card.text: Whenever you gain life, you may pay {X}, where X is less than or equal to the amount of life you gained. If you do, draw X cards.

card.name: Mishra's Workshop (OTHR)
card.text: {T}: Add {C}{C}{C}. Spend this mana only to cast artifact spells.

card.name: Fabled Passage (OTHR)
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Fabled Passage: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. Then if you control four or more lands, untap that land.

card.name: Evolving Wilds (OTHR)
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Teleportation Circle (OTHR)
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, exile up to one target artifact or creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Traveler's Cloak (Miku)
card.text: Enchant creature As Traveler's Cloak enters the battlefield, choose a land type. When Traveler's Cloak enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted creature has landwalk of the chosen type. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a land of that type.)

card.name: The Bath Song (HOLO)
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I, II — Draw two cards, then discard a card. III — Shuffle any number of target cards from your graveyard into your library. Add {U}{U}.

card.name: Treachery (OTHR)
card.text: Enchant creature When Treachery enters the battlefield, untap up to five lands. You control enchanted creature.

card.name: Aether Channeler (HOLO)
card.text: When Aether Channeler enters the battlefield, choose one — • Create a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying. • Return another target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. • Draw a card.

card.name: Unquestioned Authority (FGO)
card.text: Enchant creature When Unquestioned Authority enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted creature has protection from creatures.

card.name: Emry, Lurker of the Loch (Finana)
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control. When Emry, Lurker of the Loch enters the battlefield, mill four cards. {T}: Choose target artifact card in your graveyard. You may cast that card this turn. (You still pay its costs. Timing rules still apply.)

card.name: Trinket Mage (HOLO)
card.text: When Trinket Mage enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card with mana value 1 or less, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Tribute Mage (HOLO)
card.text: When Tribute Mage enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card with mana value 2, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Trophy Mage (FGO)
card.text: When Trophy Mage enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card with mana value 3, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Crested Sunmare (POKE)
card.text: Other Horses you control have indestructible. At the beginning of each end step, if you gained life this turn, create a 5/5 white Horse creature token.

card.name: Archangel of Thune (HOLO)
card.text: Flying Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.) Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

card.name: Restoration Angel (HOLO)
card.text: Flash Flying When Restoration Angel enters the battlefield, you may exile target non-Angel creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under your control.
